sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8d566ea64f502300afbeaa2f9310c721
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ARM_Request</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>ARM Request made using outbound rest message 
Constructs Keyword for request body</description><name>ARM_Request</name><script><![CDATA[var ARM_Request = Class.create();
ARM_Request.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getARMResults: function (){

        //parameters passed by UI MACRO
		var desc = this.getParameter('sysparm_desc');
		var rec = this.getParameter('sysparm_num');
		var requestBody = this.getARMKeywords(desc,rec);
		
		
		//Rest Message to ARM using the ARM POST method
		//Sends constructed requestbody containing keywords from description (formatted)
		var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('ARM Knowledge Request', 'ARM Post');
		r.setRequestBody(requestBody);
		var response = r.execute();        
		var responseBody = response.getBody();      
		var httpStatus = response.getStatusCode();
		var answer = responseBody;
		
		
		//httpStatus 200 is expected - anything else issue occurred
		if(httpStatus != 200){
			gs.log('ARM Request for '+rec+' recieved status:'+httpStatus);
		}
		else{
			gs.log('ARM Request for '+rec+' recieved status:'+httpStatus+' and response:'+answer);
		}
		//return JSON response to UI Macro
		return answer;

    },
    
    getARMKeywords: function(d,r){
        //d = short description r = record number
		
		//string function removes 3 character words from description
		//and stores in an array
		d = d.split( ' ' ).filter(function ( d ) {
        var word = d.match(/(\w+)/);
        return word && word[0].length > 3;
        });
		
		var array = d;
        var len = array.length;
        var i = 0;
		//var K is used to store the keywords
        var k = '[';
		
		while(i < len){
			k = k +'"'+ array[i] +'"'+', ';   
			i++;
		}

		k = k + '],';
  
		if(k.indexOf('", ],') > -1){
		  keywords = k.replace('", ],', '"],');
	      rBody = '{"keywords": ' +keywords+ ' "problemId": "0", "productId": "84"}';
		  gs.debug('ARM_Request for '+r+' - keyword builder -'+keywords);
		}
		else{
		  gs.debug('ARM_Request for '+r+' - keyword builder - Issue while building the string - ' +keywords);
		}
        
		return rBody;
    },
	
    type: 'ARM_Request'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-05 11:29:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>8d566ea64f502300afbeaa2f9310c721</sys_id><sys_mod_count>72</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ARM_Request</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8d566ea64f502300afbeaa2f9310c721</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-09-14 09:25:06</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
